title: No results returned when searching via Package view selection and dialog
description: When searching via the Package view selection and dialog, no results are returned. However, searching via the context menu in the packages view works correctly. This issue is specific to Java elements. Additionally, the search functionality should try to retrieve the Java element first and if that fails, it should display the element name instead of the fully qualified name.
OB: No results are displayed when searching via the Package view selection and dialog.
EB: The search functionality should return the appropriate results when searching via the Package view selection and dialog.
SR:
1. Open the Package view.
2. Using the search functionality in the Package view selection and dialog, enter a search query.
3. Verify that no results are returned.
4. Right-click on a package in the Package view and select 'Search' from the context menu.
5. Enter the same search query.
6. Verify that results are returned correctly.
